evidence_assessment: documentary evidence can outweigh testimony if justified
decision_reasoning: failed to provide sufficient reasons for rejecting the applicant's explanations
refugee_status: Applicant claimed refugee status due to persecution
application_details: Judicial review application under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act subsection 72(1)
conclusion_outcome: The Board made reviewable errors in credibility assessment, probative weight, and reasoning
result_of_case: Case remanded for reconsideration due to Board's errors
